original_text:
On the rock he dwells and makes his home,
    on the rocky crag and stronghold.
korean_text: 그것이 낭떠러지에 집을 지으며 뾰족한 바위 끝이나 험준한 데 살며

sentences.original_text: On the rock he dwells and makes his home
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바위 위에 살며 그곳에 집을 만듭니다

sentences.original_text: on the rocky crag and stronghold.
